title: Return to Poplar River
description: In this Dateline classic, the small town of Poplar, Montana is shaken when police find the battered body of 17-year-old Kim Nees on the outskirts of town. Keith Morrison reports.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
